fields.name: Elixir of Wrath
fields.description: Level 9 required to purchase. Click to Consume: Grants +25 Attack Damage and Bloodlust for 3 minutes. Bloodlust: Dealing physical damage to champions heals for 10% of the damage dealt. Scoring a Kill or Assist extends the duration of this Flask by 30 seconds. (Only one Flask effect may be active at a time.)
